name: rrextust
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, crrext), wceq(cfv(cuss, c0), cfv(cmetu, c1)))

stmt.origin: simprd(wcel(c0, crrext), wceq(cfv(cuss, c0), cfv(cmetu, c1)), wcel(c0, ccusp))
stmt.pretty: simprd(c0 ∈ RRExt, (UnifSt ` c0)=(metUnif ` c1), c0 ∈ CUnifSp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crrext), wceq(cfv(cuss, c0), cfv(cmetu, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, crrext), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c0, cdr)), wa(wcel(cfv(czlm, c0), cnlm), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wa(wcel(c0, ccusp), wceq(cfv(cuss, c0), cfv(cmetu, c1)))))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))

body.pretty:

⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c1 =((dist ` c0)|`(c2 × c2))
⊣ (ZMod ` c0)=(ZMod ` c0)

comment: The uniformity of an extension of ` RR ` is the uniformity generated by its distance. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-May-2018.)
